description: Retrotron is a vintage-inspired oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its shiny black box, retro console buttons, and arms and legs made from foundry materials, Retrotron brings a nostalgic touch to the modern world. Its classic screen displays waveforms and electrical signals with precision and accuracy, making it an invaluable asset in the field of electronics and technology.
name: Retrotron
